channel.title: Verincraft 1.4 Server
channel.description:
Minecraft SMP Anarchy Server
Verincraft is a PvP anarchy server, stealing and griefing is allowed!
Verincraft has opened its doors to gamers. It's a pretty open group, meaning you can play, no matter your skill level is! We are a social group of people that want to play. All we expect from you is to have fun and bring a positive attitude to our community. Our members are required to show respect to other members and players. If we find that our members are abusing then consequences will be handed out accordingly.
Verincraft is seeking to establish itself as a home for gamers who will be loyal to its value.
Why wait? Sign up at our forums http://www.verincraft.biz
